Text:
I'm sure there'll be a few people trying to say this is all 1 season.  No it's not.  One episode airing in February and the next in October does not sound like it's running in the same season.  TVrage or TV dot com and other sites will say it's one long season, but to me (as well as amazon dot com) an eight month time frame between episodes is the start of a new season.  Ten episodes per season, twenty episodes total, plus the newest ones currently being release which will be labeled S03.

Thank you.

Thanks for this I've been looking for these. This is a spin off show of a show called A Haunting, which aired on the discovery channel for four season. Pirate bay has seasons3 and 4, but it's hard to come by season 2. Still have not sen it uploaded anywhere.

If you do come across A Haunting seasons 1 -4, a upload would be great. Thanks again for all your hard work.
Found them, Nick.  It'll take some time to get ALL of them as they're on file hosting sites and split into parts, but when complete I'll post a torrent of all 4 seasons.
Thanks again trail please seed this a bit more people!
